name: Tank Rumble (Jerryzip)
description:
This is my work Tank Rumble.

Modifications:

1. New map and items change it into a battlefield game.

2. Several new scripts, such as a rotating shooter.

3. The game include 3 different levels.

And many maneuverability modifications. Remember that you have five lives for each level. I hope you enjoy it~!

Credits:

Created by Jerry Zuo.
